restaurant

Class CustomerAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.Agent
      • restaurant.CustomerAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerInterface

    public class CustomerAgent
extends Agent
implements CustomerInterface
    Restaurant customer agent. Comes to the restaurant when he/she becomes hungry. Randomly chooses a menu item and simulates eating when the food arrives. Interacts with a waiter only

      • isHungry

        public boolean isHungry()
        Specified by:
        isHungry in interface CustomerInterface
        Returns:
        true if the customer is hungry, false otherwise. Customer is hungry from time he is created (or button is pushed, until he eats and leaves.
